author: lightclient
content: I'm happy with https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/591, but on ACDC it didn't seem clear whether we were going to send the request data or the request hash over the engine. Has that been resolved?

author: jtraglia
content: Just so everyone knows, there was a bug in two test vectors for this release. We have identified the issue and fixed it. We're waiting for the requests PR (3950, to hash or not to hash) to be resolved before deciding how to proceed. If we merge that PR, we will make an alpha.8 release with those changes + the fixes. Otherwise, we might just do a hotfix.
